Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/delays at Dempster-Skokie following a mechanical problem on a train. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays at Dempster-Skokie following an earlier mechanical problem on a train.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

  • Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Skokie to Howard in both directions until 5:30 p.m.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
